I am a fan of previous Civ games, but I am a bit on the fence when it comes to Civ 5.

I got it during a sale on Steam, but never really had a chance to play it beyond trying out the demo before hand.

Speaking of the demo, Steam is the only place I can think of that has the Civ 5 demo.

Do not buy it yet. Wait for it until it goes on sale for $5 on Steam. And like Athlonic said, a new expansion is coming next week which will trigger sales for the bundle. And yes, it is very fun. It takes a while to get into though, because it has a lot of elements you need to learn.

I like rts games.. I hated Civ though. I cannot stand the turn based octangular grid setup. The scales make you feel like your playing a board game. Played it for a few hours trying to get hooked. I could not...
Civ V is maybe worth with Gods and Kings.
